title: Constructing an Astronomical Image

next.title: What Should My Image Look Like?

content:
Move the slider next to the r filter back to its original location (so the image looks as it did before you moved it.)

By adjusting the amount of light from each filter using the sliders you can create a color balanced image. However, as you saw above, if the slider for a filter is moved too far to the left or the right, that color in the image can be too strong or too weak for the image to be color balanced.
